verses.name: Matthew 23:18
verses.text: And, Whosoever shall swear by the altar, it is nothing; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it, he is guilty.

verses.name: Matthew 23:19
verses.text: Ye fools and blind: for whether is greater, the gift, or the altar that sanctifieth the gift?

verses.name: Matthew 23:20
verses.text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar, sweareth by it, and by all things thereon.

verses.name: Matthew 23:21
verses.text: And whoso shall swear by the temple, sweareth by it, and by him that dwelleth therein.

verses.name: Matthew 23:22
verses.text: And he that shall swear by heaven, sweareth by the throne of God, and by him that sitteth thereon.
